name: WorkspaceFile_GetWorkspaceFile
description: This method returns a binary version of a file in a workspace.

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

is_download.description: When **true,** the `Content-Disposition` header is set in the response. The value of the header provides the filename of the file. The default is **false.**

pdf_version.description: When **true** the file is returned in PDF format.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
